old: 王家に協力することになるとはな
column2: I never thought I would be cooperating with the royal family.
speaker: Bertha's Bandit Group

old: 人生、何が起こるかわからんもんだ！
column2: You never know what will happen in life!
speaker: Bertha's Bandit Group

old: ま、こういうのも悪くはないぜ
column2: Well, this isn't too bad either.
speaker: Bertha's Bandit Group

old:
俺たちが今まで盗みを働いた件を
チャラにするって話には――ならないか
column2: I'm not sure if you're talking about making amends for all the times we've stolen from you...
speaker: Bertha's Bandit Group
